alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 1:59AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Custer, west central Pennington and east central Weston Counties through 230 AM MDT... At 159 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Moon, or 9 miles east of Newcastle, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Moon around 215 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Redbank Spring Campground, Deerfield, Deerfield Reservoir, Bear Mountain Lookout and Medicine Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Southern Black Hills
